attributes.action: Allow Members of The Public To Throw Bricks Through The Windows of Cars Having Their Engines Revved On Housing Estates When It's Late
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Anti-social behaviour plagues our society in many shapes and forms.

This petition is proposed as the ultimate deterrant to people (both male and female) who think it is fair to produce lots of (unnecessary) noise from their motor vehicles at inappropriate times in inappropriate places.

Members of the public would be protected from any liability for repair to said vehicles.

Thank you for reading.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
